hero.title: Roman Derlemenko
hero.intro: Hi! My name is Roman. I'm a software developer based in Kiev, Ukraine.
hero.professional: I code primarily in PHP and JavaScript, but never afraid to get my hands dirty exploring all kinds of new tech, whether it be a new language, programming paradigm or anything related to the web.
hero.personal: I'm interested in tech, psychology, philosophy and linguistics. Love learning new human languages and intolerant of stagnation.
